name: asherdan

name: mr_pete
text: German Existential Performance Art is now part of the badly-formed mental image Americans have of that country. So when you actually do meet one, you want to quote the Big Lebowski at them and wink, forgetting for a moment there are still people who think this way.

name: madnes
text:
Germans do not find Big Lebowski-esque mocking of their accents humorous, particularly if it is at a BBQ they are hosting, featuring various sausages and rieslings they flew in from afar.

Just a tip, in case your weekend turns out like that.

name: rotating-dog
text: Zey believe in nuzzing

name: gmm
text: But do zey believe in nuzzling?

name: wozzeck
text: Zey belive in ze Nuzzle of ein SturmGewehr.

name: smallberries
text: My badly-formed mental image of ze Germans has always been a result of the Monty Python sketch featuring Mr. Hilter, Mr. Heimlich Bimmler and the gregarious Ron Vibbentrop.

name: smallberries
text: Once again, with feeling: Monty Python sketch

name: relaxing
text: Why would Germans fly in their rieslings?  They grow the best rieslings in their back yards.

name: boredom_man
text: I can see Ray, electric blue and naked, standing on Mars, bringing forth a great clockwork fortress from the dust.

text: yes you could, but why oh why would you?... besides, that role would fit better on beef's narrow shoulders. ray is much more the owl dude, lyle the comedian, and i dunno about teodor and cornelius

text:
Oh, pish-posh. It is beyond conception that anyone would be dumb enough to actually attempt to film Watchmen .

text: I have grown to enjoy these ones very much. This is the essence of dry (webcomic) humour.

name: cdl146
text:
Ray's dialogue translated:
"I love my culture"
"But, can I change?"
"no."

text: wow... that's a perfect summation of ray. groovy

name: trollcollins
text:
I have only just now noticed the "inspired by John A. (scarygoround.com)" at the top.

Scary-go-round is one of the few webcomics that keeps company with Achewood at the pinnacle of my affections. I am so happy when they blend. It is a wonderful combination of flavours.
